sentence.Network_en: The stair carpet gets a lot of wear and tear and will soon need replacing.
sentence.Network_cn: 铺在楼梯上的地毯磨损得很厉害,因而很快就要更换.

sentence.Network_en: The carpet was a wedding present from the Prime Minister.
sentence.Network_cn: 这张地毯是首相送的结婚礼物。

sentence.Network_en: It is not possible to reposition the carpet without damaging it.
sentence.Network_cn: 想要挪动地毯又不让它损坏是不可能的。
